item.title: How to install IRAF Community Distribution and PyRAF on M1/M2 (Apple Silicon) Mac?
item.description: This tutorial is for installing IRAF Community Distribution and PyRAF on M1/M2 (Apple Silicon) Mac. The following steps are tested on Mac OS Sonoma 14.

item.title: How to install and initiate IRAF in Ubuntu/Mac OS
item.description: 0. Introduction to IRAF IRAF (Image Reduction and Analysis Facility) is a general purpose software system for the reduction and analysis of astronomical data.
